title: BANNED from +DebateTheDissidentRight because the owner doesn't like me saying the nigger word in my own guilds that I own!

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
Huh, is this true? [Apparently that's not allowed](https://ruqqus.com/help/terms). (Are there even rules for guildmasters? And how would this even be enforced? Is "no reason" a valid reason for exiling someone, while "you spammed endless summer posts on other guilds" is invalid?)

>As a moderator ("Guildmaster") of a Guild, you will not:

> * Penalize users for content or conduct outside of your Guild

Are these the only comments you've made?

* https://ruqqus.com/post/29nn/what-liberals-do-not-understand-about/7m1b
* https://ruqqus.com/post/29ig/these-were-the-rules-of-rdebatealtright/7ktu
* https://ruqqus.com/post/2aty/i-found-you-guys/7pl6

![](https://i.ibb.co/MR5FfzB/sfrohne.png)
body_html:
Huh, is this true? Apparently that's not allowed. (Are there even rules for guildmasters? And how would this even be enforced? Is "no reason" a valid reason for exiling someone, while "you spammed endless summer posts on other guilds" is invalid?)

As a moderator ("Guildmaster") of a Guild, you will not:

  • Penalize users for content or conduct outside of your Guild

Are these the only comments you've made?

  • https://ruqqus.com/post/29nn/what-liberals-do-not-understand-about/7m1b
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/29ig/these-were-the-rules-of-rdebatealtright/7ktu
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/2aty/i-found-you-guys/7pl6
